en.header1: Hello and welcome to my portfolio. I am a web development enthusiast seeking new opportunities to enhance my skills and knowledge in this exciting field.
en.header2: I am open to job offers as well as collaborations with other developers to work together on future projects.
en.header3: Through my previous work experiences, I have developed valuable skills for any profession, such as adaptability, communication, creativity, and attention to detail, as well as my ability to learn quickly. As a self-taught developer, I have learned to work independently and find creative solutions to problems that arise. My teaching experience has also allowed me to develop important social skills, such as teamwork, sociability, and empathy. I am confident that these skills will allow me to integrate easily into a team of developers, positively contribute to projects, and continue to learn and grow in this exciting field.
en.header4: If you are interested in my profile or would simply like to learn more about my background and projects, please do not hesitate to contact me.
en.header5: I am always open to networking opportunities and would be happy to chat with you.
en.name: Your Name :
en.NetFlixCopyDescription: Here is my first project, Netflix Like, which offers a reinterpretation of the Netflix presentation page, complete with a backend for managing favorites and secure login management.
en.BeOnTimeDescription: BeOnTime is my second project, designed in collaboration with three juniors and under my supervision. Its purpose is to assist accountants in managing their time and tasks by making their work easier through a comprehensive application featuring user authentication.
en.HearthstoneDescription: Hearthstone Filter is my third project, and it helped me deepen my understanding of filters and the use of external APIs. It catalogs the entirety of the cards from the Hearthstone game.
en.iaVolleyDescription: IaVolley, my fourth project, allowed me to explore artificial intelligence through the Brain.js library. The interface, connected to a backend and a database, enables the addition and utilization of data processed by the neural network to predict victories and defeats based on observed statistics.
